Activity: Arrive, make tea (Lemon Balm today!). Review overnight tickets and emails.
Follow up with @itpm-1 regarding the archived patient record access issue from yesterday. Confirm that the user's permissions have been updated.
Address a new ticket from @da-2 reporting issues with connecting to the EHR database using a specific data analysis tool. Troubleshoot the issue by first verifying the database connection settings.
Discover that the database connection settings in the data analysis tool are incorrect. Provide the correct settings to the user and guide them through the configuration process.
Confirm that the user can now successfully connect to the EHR database. Document the solution in the knowledge base. Update the ticketing system and close the ticket.
Begin working on another ticket from @qatest-1 reporting issues with testing a new EHR module.

Collaborate with @qatest-1 to understand the testing issues. Provide guidance and support to help them overcome the challenges. Discuss the specific issues and testing steps with the EHR developer and @ehrdev-2. @PEOPLE
Assist @qatest-1 in identifying the root cause of the testing issues. Brainstorm potential solutions and work together to implement them.
Lunch Break. Write in my journal, just to reflect a bit.
Continue to support @qatest-1 in the testing process, answering questions and providing assistance as needed.
Monitor the ticketing system and address new incoming tickets.
A user, @ehrdev-2, is reporting issues with integrating a new third-party application with the EHR. Research the integration process and common problems.
Discover that the integration issue is related to API incompatibility. Contact the third-party application vendor and the EHR vendor to resolve the incompatibility. @PEOPLE
Document the integration issue and the steps taken to resolve it. Update the ticketing system and put on hold until API incompatibility is resolved.
Continue working on the knowledge base article, focusing on database connectivity issues and testing problems.
Check emails one last time. Prepare for the next day's tasks.
